vulnerable.commit_message:
Bug 701815: avoid uninitialised bytes being >7, which broke indexing.

Fixes:
    ./sanbin/gs -dBATCH -dNOPAUSE -sOutputFile=tmp -sDEVICE=jetp3852 ../bug-701815.pdf
vulnerable.cve_desc: A buffer overflow vulnerability in jetp3852_print_page() in devices/gdev3852.c of Artifex Software GhostScript v9.50 allows a remote attacker to escalate privileges via a crafted PDF file. This is fixed in v9.51.
